description: teardrop-shaped body on wide foot, with overarching handle and straight spout; spout opening has small stopper; second stopper fits at top of handle; decorated with sponge-applied loops in green, grey, yellow and brick red
markings: on bottom, in black: [MAJOLIKA / HANDPAINTED / SMF (inside a shield) / SCHRAMBERG / GERMANY] and [68]
object_name: Decanter, from an eight-piece cordial set
title: Decanter, from an eight-piece cordial set
